title: Your First Wedding
description: Start with a cosy table and a small guest list. Follow the clues to create a calm, drama-free seating plan.
clues: Mum insists on sitting at the very end of the table where she can see the whole room.
Alice wants to sit next to Ben so they can share jokes during the speeches.
Dad prefers the other end of the table, opposite Mum.
Ben doesn’t mind where he sits as long as he’s between two people he knows.
hints: Try putting Mum at one end of the table and Dad at the opposite end.
If Alice must sit next to Ben, they should share two seats in the middle.
